Parameter.Name: Sys

Parameter.Name: insert_after_pol

Function.Name: AddOn_Pol

Parameter.Comment: note that inserted *after* standard output policy

Function.Name: AddOn_Pol
Function.Comment: ADD POLICY: calculation of marginal tax rates

Parameter.Name: pol_name
Parameter.Comment: calculate indicators and output selected variables

Function.Name: AddOn_Par
Function.Comment: MODIFY STANDARD OUTPUT POLICY

Parameter.Name: insert_func
Parameter.Comment: i.e. name of policy (sheet) and function row (by green numbers)

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: new parameter (i.e. produce standard output only for the baseline)

Function.Name: AddOn_ExtensionSwitch
Function.Comment: use full take-up assumption

Policy.Name: MTR_PREP
Policy.Comment: DEF: preparations for marginal tax rate calculations

Function.Name: DefConst
Function.Comment: define constants

Parameter.Name: $MARGIN
Parameter.Comment: change margin if required; increase income by x%/100 (see sheet: config);

Function.Name: DefTu
Function.Comment: define hh unit (to ensure exists)

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Comment: comprises of all household members

Function.Name: Store
Function.Comment: STORE initial values (of input variables)

Parameter.Name: postfix
Parameter.Comment: ils_earns and its components are stored as x_backup

Parameter.Name: il
Parameter.Comment: (i.e. ils_earns_backup, yem_backup, yse_backup)

Function.Name: Loop
Function.Comment: DEFINE primary loop over tax-ben calculations

Parameter.Name: num_iterations
Parameter.Comment: 1st iteration: standard tax-ben calculations

Parameter.Name: loop_id
Parameter.Comment: 2nd iteration: tax-ben calculations with marginally increased income

Parameter.Name: start_after_pol
Parameter.Comment: loops over whole tax-benefit system including MTR_INIT and MTR_STORE

Function.Name: UnitLoop
Function.Comment: DEFINE secondary loop over household members

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: loop is only carried out in the 2nd iteration of BASE-loop

Parameter.Name: elig_unit
Parameter.Comment: loop iterates as often over household as there are persons

Parameter.Name: elig_unit_cond
Parameter.Comment: … with positive income as defined by ils_earns

Parameter.Name: first_pol
Parameter.Comment: loops over whole tax-benefit system including MTR_INIT and MTR_STORE

Function.Name: DefIl
Function.Comment: define earnings that will be modified for tax-benefit calculations

Parameter.Name: yse
Parameter.Comment: self-employment earnings

Parameter.Name: yem
Parameter.Comment: earnings from employment

Policy.Name: MTR_INIT
Policy.Comment: DEF: initialisations for marginal tax rate calculations

Function.Name: IlVarOp
Function.Comment: modify earnings

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: … to increase it for the following tax-ben calc. where appropriate

Parameter.Name: operator_il
Parameter.Comment: i.e. increase only in 2nd iteration of the primary loop, increase only for

Parameter.Name: operand
Parameter.Comment: one person in time within each household

Parameter.Name: sel_var
Parameter.Comment: increase the main component of ils_earns

Function.Name: IlVarOp
Function.Comment: modify earnings

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: … to increase it for the following tax-ben calc. where appropriate

Parameter.Name: operator_il
Parameter.Comment: i.e. increase only in 2nd iteration of the primary loop, increase only for

Parameter.Name: operand
Parameter.Comment: one person in time within each household

Parameter.Name: sel_var
Parameter.Comment: increase the main component of ils_earns

Policy.Name: MTR_STORE
Policy.Comment: DEF: store each iteration's results for marginal tax rate calculations

Function.Name: Store
Function.Comment: STORE the results of the primary loop

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: only the results of baseline tax-benefit calculations

Parameter.Name: il
Parameter.Comment: ils_dispy and its components are stored as x_base1

Parameter.Name: il
Parameter.Comment: change income concepts if required

Parameter.Name: var
Parameter.Comment: PL: yem; FI: total self-employment income

Parameter.Name: var
Parameter.Comment: SK: gross profit

Parameter.Name: var
Parameter.Comment: FR: total earnings

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: technical step

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: carry out any arithmetic operation using the newly defined HH unit;

Parameter.Name: output_var
Parameter.Comment: this triggers the HH unit to be constructed (i.e. 'activated') which is

Parameter.Name: TAX_UNIT
Parameter.Comment: necessary for the level parameter of func_store (see next function)

Function.Name: Store
Function.Comment: STORE the results of the secondary loop (mostly at the hh level)

Parameter.Name: run_cond
Parameter.Comment: i.e. calculations with increased income:

Parameter.Name: postloop
Parameter.Comment: (there needs to be 1 storage variable per person with positive ils_earns)

Parameter.Name: il
Parameter.Comment: store after tax income in ils_dispy_unit1, ils_dispy_unit2, etc.

Parameter.Name: il
Parameter.Comment: change income concepts if required

Parameter.Name: postfix
Parameter.Comment: restore original income (ils_earns) at the beginning of each iteration …

Policy.Name: MTR_CALC
Policy.Comment: DEF: calculation of marginal tax rates

Function.Name: DefVar
Function.Comment: define new variables

Parameter.Name: ils_earns_diff
Parameter.Comment: marginal tax rate (in percent)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc
Parameter.Comment: increase of earnings (at the individual level)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc_pen
Parameter.Comment: benefit component of marginal tax rate (in percent)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc_tax
Parameter.Comment: tax component of marginal tax rate (in percent)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc_sicee
Parameter.Comment: employee sic component of marginal tax rate (in percent)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc_sicse
Parameter.Comment: self-employed sic component of marginal tax rate (in percent)

Parameter.Name: mtrpc_sicot
Parameter.Comment: other sic component of marginal tax rate (in percent)

Function.Name: Elig
Function.Comment: define eligible persons to calculate MTR

Parameter.Name: elig_cond
Parameter.Comment: i.e. a person for whom the unit loop was run

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate change in earnings

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_earns from both loops is stored at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate MTR (in percentage terms)

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_dispy_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_dispy_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: public pensions

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_pen_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_pen_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: means-tested benefits

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_benmt_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_benmt_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: non means-tested benefits

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_bennt_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_bennt_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: taxes

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_tax_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_tax_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: employee SIC

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_sicee_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_sicee_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: self-employed SIC

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_sicse_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_sicse_base1 at IND level)

Function.Name: Restore
Function.Comment: RESTORE results of baseline tax-benefit calculations

Parameter.Name: postloop
Parameter.Comment: this is switched off by default as baseline results are outputted in a separate file

Function.Name: DefOutput
Function.Comment: DEFINE output for marginal tax rate calculations

Parameter.Name: replace_void_by
Parameter.Comment: replace missing (i.e. void) values

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: calculate the contribution by components: other SIC

Parameter.Name: formula
Parameter.Comment: (note ils_sicot_mtr is stored at HH level, ils_sicot_base1 at IND level)

Policy.Name: MTR_SWITCH
Policy.Comment: DEF: preparations for marginal tax rate calculations

Parameter.Name: Param_Id
Parameter.Comment: UK: use full take-up assumption
